Text:
Is this the new updated version by any chance? 
Acronis Inc has released Update 2

http://www.pcauthority.com.au/News/300328,acronis-true-image-home-2012-update-2-adds-smart-scheduler-start-enhanced-hardware-support-and-fixes-plenty-of-bugs.aspx

Yes, this is the latest build/version. You cannot install this, you may use this to backup your disk in offline mode or the term "cold imaging". Burn the ISO or you can make a bootable USB using YUMI or XBOOT.
Thanks nikita200. Is it not possible to have clearly visible text.
Thnx Man! My standard Acronis USB didn't recognize my hard drives after changing the motherboard. This ISO image saved me tons of time. I burned it on a CD and it works just fine. Thanx again!
